languages.text: {n}Вооружившись вилкой, вы прокалываете насквозь один из хвостов кревециуса. К разочарованию сочувствующей вам публики, кревециус оставляет вам свою конечность, отбросив ее, и соскакивает со стола с четырьмя оставшимися.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вооружившись вилкой, молниеносным движением вы прокалываете насквозь один из хвостов кревециуса. К разочарованию сочувствующей вам публики, кревециус ловко оставляет вам свой хвост на прощание, соскочив со стола с оставшимися четырьмя. Возникший на его траектории ласеракс лениво слизывает беглеца с дороги.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You arm yourself with a fork and pierce one of the shrimperius's tails. Much to the disappointment of your sympathetic audience, the creature leaves you with a discarded extremity and scurries off the table with its four remaining ones.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вооружившись вилкой, вы прокалываете насквозь один из хвостов кревециуса. К разочарованию сочувствующей вам публики, кревециус оставляет вам свою конечность, отбросив ее, и соскакивает со стола с четырьмя оставшимися.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You arm yourself with a fork and pierce through one of the shrimperius's tails. Much to the disappointment of your sympathetic audience, the shrimperius leaves you with a discarded extremity and scurries off the table with the four remaining ones.{/n}

{n}You arm yourself with a fork and pierce through one of the shrimperius's tails. Much to the disappointment of your sympathetic audience, the shrimperius leaves you with a discarded extremity and scurries off the table with the four remaining ones.{/n}

{n}You arm yourself with a fork and pierce one of the shrimperius's tails. Much to the disappointment of your sympathetic audience, the creature leaves you with a discarded extremity and scurries off the table with its four remaining ones.{/n}

{n}You arm yourself with a fork and pierce one of the shrimperius's tails. Much to the disappointment of your sympathetic audience, the creature leaves you with a discarded extremity and scurries off the table with its four remaining ones.{/n}

{n}You arm yourself with a fork and pierce one of the shrimperius's tails. Much to the disappointment of your sympathetic audience, the creature leaves you with a discarded extremity and scurries off the table with its four remaining ones.{/n}

{n}You arm yourself with a fork and pierce one of the shrimperius's tails. Much to the disappointment of your sympathetic audience, the creature leaves you with a discarded extremity and scurries off the table with its four remaining ones.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你举起叉子，刺穿了五尾虾的其中一条尾巴。然而，那只虾却扯掉了那条被钉住的尾巴，带着剩下的四条尾巴匆匆溜下了桌子。这一幕让那些满心期待的围观群众大失所望。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You arm yourself with a fork and pierce one of the shrimperius's tails. Much to the disappointment of your sympathetic audience, the creature leaves you with a discarded extremity and scurries off the table with its four remaining ones.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你举起叉子，刺穿了五尾虾的其中一条尾巴。然而，那只虾却扯掉了那条被钉住的尾巴，带着剩下的四条尾巴匆匆溜下了桌子。这一幕让那些满心期待的围观群众大失所望。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te pertrechas con un tenedor y atraviesas una de las cinco colas del gamboide. Para consternación de tu entregado público, la criatura te deja con una extremidad cercenada y se escabulle de la mesa usando las cuatro que le quedan.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You arm yourself with a fork and pierce one of the shrimperius's tails. Much to the disappointment of your sympathetic audience, the creature leaves you with a discarded extremity and scurries off the table with its four remaining ones.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te pertrechas con un tenedor y atraviesas una de las cinco colas del gamboide. Para consternación de tu entregado público, la criatura te deja con una extremidad cercenada y se escabulle de la mesa usando las cuatro que le quedan.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir çatalı silah bilip eline alıyorsun ve imparidesin kuyruklarından birini deliyorsun. Sana şefkatle bakan seyircilerin büyük bir hayal kırıklığına uğraması yetmiyormuş gibi yaratık, ardında bir uzvunu bırakıyor ve kalan dört kuyruğuyla masadan sıvışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You arm yourself with a fork and pierce one of the shrimperius's tails. Much to the disappointment of your sympathetic audience, the creature leaves you with a discarded extremity and scurries off the table with its four remaining ones.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir çatalı silah bilip eline alıyorsun ve imparidesin kuyruklarından birini deliyorsun. Sana şefkatle bakan seyircilerin büyük bir hayal kırıklığına uğraması yetmiyormuş gibi yaratık, ardında bir uzvunu bırakıyor ve kalan dört kuyruğuyla masadan sıvışıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたはフォークで武装し、シュリンペリウスの尻尾の一つを貫く。共感する聴衆は落胆し、その生物は不要な四肢を残してあなたを去り、残りの4本の尻尾でテーブルを降りてチョコチョコと動く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You arm yourself with a fork and pierce one of the shrimperius's tails. Much to the disappointment of your sympathetic audience, the creature leaves you with a discarded extremity and scurries off the table with its four remaining ones.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたはフォークで武装し、シュリンペリウスの尻尾の一つを貫く。共感する聴衆は落胆し、その生物は不要な四肢を残してあなたを去り、残りの4本の尻尾でテーブルを降りてチョコチョコと動く。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{mf|Armé|Armée} d'une fourchette, vous parvenez à transpercer l'une des queues de la crevimperius, mais la créature s'empresse de se débarrasser de cette extrémité désormais encombrante et, sans attendre son reste, s'enfuit de la table sous les regards déçus de l'auditoire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You arm yourself with a fork and pierce one of the shrimperius's tails. Much to the disappointment of your sympathetic audience, the creature leaves you with a discarded extremity and scurries off the table with its four remaining ones.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{mf|Armé|Armée} d'une fourchette, vous parvenez à transpercer l'une des queues de la crevimperius, mais la créature s'empresse de se débarrasser de cette extrémité désormais encombrante et, sans attendre son reste, s'enfuit de la table sous les regards déçus de l'auditoire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bewaffnest dich mit einer Gabel und stichst sie in einen der Schwänze des Shrimperius. Sehr zur Enttäuschung deines Publikums lässt die Kreatur dich mit einem abgeworfenen Schwanz zurück und huscht mit ihren verbleibenden vier Schwänzen eilig vom Tisch.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You arm yourself with a fork and pierce one of the shrimperius's tails. Much to the disappointment of your sympathetic audience, the creature leaves you with a discarded extremity and scurries off the table with its four remaining ones.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bewaffnest dich mit einer Gabel und stichst sie in einen der Schwänze des Shrimperius. Sehr zur Enttäuschung deines Publikums lässt die Kreatur dich mit einem abgeworfenen Schwanz zurück und huscht mit ihren verbleibenden vier Schwänzen eilig vom Tisch.{/n}
